Whenever you play 3 or less cards in a turn, draw 3 additional cards at the start of your next turn.

title: Prayer Wheel
description:
**Rare**
Normal enemies drop an additional card reward.

title: Shovel
description:
**Rare**
You can now Dig for loot at **Rest Site**s.

title: Stone Calendar
description:
**Rare**
At the end of turn 7, deal 40 damage to ALL enemies.

title: The Specimen
description:
**Rare (Silent only)**
Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any **Poison** it has to a random enemy.

title: Thread and Needle
description:
**Rare**
At the start of each combat, gain 4 Plated Armor.

title: Tingsha
description:
**Rare (Silent only)**
Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.

title: Torii
description:
**Rare**
Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked **Attack** damage, reduce it to 1.

title: Tough Bandages
description:
**Rare (Silent only)**
Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.

title: Turnip
description:
**Rare**
You can no longer become Frail.

title: Unceasing Top
description:
**Rare**
Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.

title: Wing Boots
description:
**Rare**
You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to 3 times.

title: Astrolabe
description:
**Boss**
Upon pickup, choose and **Transform** 3 cards, then **Upgrade** them.

title: Black Blood
description:
**Boss (Ironclad only)**
Replaces **Burning Blood**. At the end of combat, heal 10 HP.

title: Black Star
description:
**Boss**
**Elites** now drop 2 Relics when defeated.

title: Busted Crown
description:
**Boss**
Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. On Card Reward screens, you have 2 fewer cards to choose from

title: Calling Bell
description:
**Boss**
Obtain 3 **Curses** and 3 Relics.

title: Coffee Dripper
description:
**Boss**
Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer Rest at Rest Sites

title: Cursed Key
description:
**Boss**
Gain 1 **Energy** at the start of each turn. Whenever you open a non-boss **chest**, obtain a **Curse**.

title: Ectoplasm
description:
**Boss**
Gain 1 **Energy** at the start of each turn. You can no longer gain **Gold**.

title: Empty Cage
description:
**Boss**
Upon pickup, remove 2 cards from your deck.

title: Eternal Feather
description:
**Boss**
For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 2 HP whenever you enter a **Rest Site**.

title: Frozen Core
description:
**Boss
(Defect only)**
Replaces **Cracked Core**. If you end your turn with empty Orb slots, Channel 1 Frost.

title: Fusion Hammer
description:
**Boss**
Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites.

title: Hovering Kite
description:
**Boss (Silent only)**
Gain 1 Energy and discard 2 cards at the start of each turn.

title: Inserter
description:
**Boss
(Defect only)**
Every 2 turns, gain 1 Orb slot.

title: Lizard Tail
description:
**Boss**
When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).

title: Mark of Pain
description:
**Boss
(Ironclad only)**
Gain 1 **Energy** at the start of each turn. Start combats with 2 **Wound**s in your draw pile.

title: Nuclear Battery
description:
**Boss
(Defect only)**
At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Plasma.

title: Orrery
description:
**Boss**
Choose and add 5 cards to your deck.

title: Pandora's Box
description:
**Boss**
**Transform** all **Strike**s and **Defend**s.

title: Philosopher's Stone
description:
**Boss**
Gain 1 **Energy** at the start of each turn. ALL enemies start with 2 **Strength**.

title: Ring of the Serpent
description:
**Boss (Silent only)**
Replaces **Ring of the Snake**. At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

title: Runic Cube
description:
**Boss (Ironclad only)**
Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.

title: Runic Dome
description:
**Boss**
Gain 1 **Energy** at the start of each turn. You can no longer see enemy Intents.

title: Runic Pyramid
description:
**Boss**
At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand.

title: Snecko Eye
description:
**Boss**
Draw 2 additional cards each turn. Start each combat **Confused**.

title: Sozu
description:
**Boss**
Gain 1 **Energy** at the start of each turn. You can no longer obtain **potions**.

title: Tiny House
description:
**Boss**
Obtain 1 **potion**. Gain 30 **Gold**. Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 card. Upgrade 1 Random card.

title: Velvet Choker
description:
**Boss**
Gain 1 **Energy** at the start of each turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.

title: White Beast Statue
description:
**Boss**
**Potions** always drop after combat.

title: Wrist Blade
description:
**Boss (Silent only)**
Attacks that cost 0 deal 3 additional damage.

title: Bloody Idol
description:
**Event**
Whenever you gain **Gold**, heal 5 HP.

title: Cultist Headpiece
description:
**Event**
You feel more talkative.

title: Enchiridion
description:
**Event**
At the start of each combat, add a random **Power** card to your hand. It costs 0 until the end of turn.

title: Face of Cleric
description:
**Event**
Raise your Max HP by 1 after each combat.

title: Golden Idol
description:
**Event**
Enemies drop 25% more **Gold**.

title: Gremlin Visage
description:
**Event**
Start each combat with 1 Weak.

title: Mark of the Bloom
description:
**Event**
You can no longer heal.

title: Mutagenic Strength
description:
**Event**
Start each combat with 3 **Strength** that is lost at the end of your turn.

title: N'loth's Hungry Face
description:
**Event**
The next non-boss chest you open is empty.

title: Necronomicon
description:
**Event**
The first **Attack** played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice. When you take this relic, become **Cursed**.

title: Neow's Lament
description:
**Event**
Enemies in your first 3 combats will have 1 HP.

title: Nilry's Codex
description:
**Event**
At the end of each turn, you can choose 1 of 3 random cards to shuffle into your draw pile.

title: Nloth's Gift
description:
**Event**
Triples the chance of receiving rare cards as monster rewards.

title: Odd Mushroom
description:
**Event**
When **Vulnerable**, take 25% more damage rather than 50%.

title: Red Mask
description:
**Event**
At the start of each combat, apply 1 **Weak** to ALL enemies.

title: Spirit Poop
description:
**Event**
It's unpleasant.

title: Ssserpent Head
description:
**Event**
Whenever you enter a ? room, gain 50 Gold.

title: Warped Tongs
description:
**Event**
At the start of your turn, Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.

title: Brimstone
description:
**Shop (Ironclad only)**
At the start of your turn, gain 2 **Strength** and ALL enemies gain 1 **Strength**.

title: Cauldron
description:
**Shop**
When obtained, brews 5 random **potions**.

title: Chemical X
description:
**Shop**
The effects of your cost X cards are increased by 2.

title: Clockwork Souvenir
description:
**Shop**
At the start of each combat, gain 1 **Artifact**.

title: Dolly's Mirror
description:
**Shop**
Upon pickup, obtain an additional copy of a card in your deck.

title: Frozen Eye
description:
**Shop**
When viewing your Draw Pile, the cards are now shown in order.

title: Hand Drill
description:
**Shop**
Whenever you break an enemy's Block, apply 2 **Vulnerable**.

title: Lee's Waffle
description:
**Shop**
Raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP.

title: Meal Ticket
description:
**Shop**
Whenever you enter a shop room, heal 10 HP.

title: Medical Kit
description:
**Shop**
**Status** cards can now be played. Playing a Status will **Exhaust** the card.

title: Membership Card
description:
**Shop**
50% discount on all products!

title: Orange Pellets
description:
**Shop**
Whenever you play a Power, Attack, and Skill in the same turn, remove all of your Debuffs.

title: Prismatic Shard
description:
**Shop**
Combat reward screens now contain colorless cards and cards from other colors.

title: Runic Capacitor
description:
**Shop
(Defect only)**
Start each combat with 3 additional Orb slots.

title: Sling of Courage
description:
**Shop**
Start each Elite combat with 2 Strength.

title: Strange Spoon
description:
**Shop**
Cards which **Exhaust** when played will instead discard 50% of the time.

title: The Abacus
description:
**Shop**
Gain 6 Block whenever you shuffle your draw pile.

title: Toolbox
description:
**Shop**
At the start of each combat, add a random colorless card to your hand.

title: Toy Ornithopter
description:
**Shop**
Whenever you use a **potion**, heal 5 HP.

title: Twisted Funnel
description:
**Shop
(Silent)**
At the start of each combat, apply 4 **Poison** to ALL enemies.

title: Circlet
description:
**Special**
Collect as many as you can. (Given when you exhaust the relic pool)
